power generation

World Leader of Steam Turbine Components

For more than a century, we have consolidated the best available technology from numerous steam turbine suppliers into core platforms that support our advanced, innovative, efficient, and reliable steam turbine solutions. PCC Aero has highly-qualified and specialized engineering centers and factories in key markets around the world.

high availability and reliability

Our robust, reliable steam turbine components are enhanced by control systems and the power of PCC Aero Digital solutions. Our proprietary long-term testing program validates material behavior and ensures steam turbine component reliability. Get extended maintenance intervals and increased turbine availability from advanced methods during the design phase.

enhanced operational flexibility

Advanced fracture mechanic methods provide reliable lifetime assessment of the steam turbine components and increased cycling capabilities. An enhanced blade groove design reduces thermal stresses for increased rotor life.

high-efficiency last-stage blades

Our enhanced last-stage blade portfolio offers:

Dense staggered last stage blade sizes for project specific cold-end conditions and increased efficiency (up to 60’’ for 50Hz and up to 50” for 60Hz).

A robust design with stress-enhanced grooves and blade attachments for higher reliability· Features such as full tip shroud, enhanced tip section with low shock loss, aerodynamic part span connector, and increased root-reaction that improve steam turbine performance.

Advanced radial vortexing improves performance and hood integration over a range of loads.
